QuestData.Title: Aid for the Wounded
QuestData.Description: $n, listen! Unlike Joren, I've no need for yer blade, but I do need someone with a steady hand and a bit o' courage.$b$bOur mountaineers are trained to protect the village from the odd wolf attack... not an all-out trogg invasion! Many of our best have succumbed to wounds and exhaustion, and I need yer help bandaging them up.$b$bHere, take my first aid kit and assist as many as ye can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Sten's First Aid Kit on 4 Wounded Coldridge Mountaineers.
QuestData.RewardText: Many of those that y'saved have already made it back to camp. The wounds're well-dressed! Ye might have a future in first aid, if ye're into that sorta thing.
